price: 47. Hinnay usun digaala keenil obtaah tuuy waqdi keenik bayissaamak meesitak sugan waqdi, Yalli ken digaalaah, ken baysaamak amaan maay geen? tokkel diggah sin Rabbi isi ginoh xuwaw li nacror li kinni digaalah keenit yasissikeemik.
arabic: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ تَخَوُّفٖ فَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمۡ لَرَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٌ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: aw yakhudhahum ʿalā takhawwufin fa-inna rabbakum laraūfun raḥīmun
